metadata.name: Crypto Anger
metadata.description:
Crypto Anger   
Position: 48.82309,2.33900    
Time: 1681919880  
N°:#01  
⨁ Some real Anger has been created and added into the blockchain  
⨁ The pavement rests at the bottom of the water at this point https://goo.gl/maps/toxDs7JsAz9yaw799

This emochain is a stone thrown in the pond connected by radio frequency with this NFT. The artist Arseneca has created a link between the tangible and intangible world. The NFT contains the geographical coordinates from where the pavement is located to the bottom of the water, and the Unix time of the moment.  
 An emochain is like a vibrating rope between the two worlds. 
 The reflection in the NFT reveals the moment when the emochain was created 

𝐴𝑟𝑠𝑒𝑛𝑒𝑐𝑎 𝑖𝑠 𝑎 𝑓𝑟𝑒𝑛𝑐ℎ  underground 𝑎𝑟𝑡𝑖𝑠𝑡 𝑤ℎ𝑜 𝑙𝑖𝑣𝑒𝑠 𝑖𝑛 𝑃𝑎𝑟𝑖𝑠. 𝐻𝑒 𝑖𝑠 𝑛𝑜𝑡 𝑑𝑒𝑐𝑒𝑎𝑠𝑒𝑑 𝑠𝑖𝑛𝑐𝑒 1974. 𝐻𝑒 𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑡 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑜𝑟𝑖𝑔𝑖𝑛 𝑜𝑓 the emochain  a 𝑐𝑜𝑛𝑛𝑒𝑐𝑡𝑒𝑑 𝑎𝑟𝑡 mouvment, 𝑤ℎ𝑖𝑐ℎ ℎ𝑒 ℎ𝑎𝑠 𝑏𝑒𝑒𝑛 𝑚𝑎𝑛𝑖𝑝𝑢𝑙𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑓𝑜𝑟 20 𝑦𝑒𝑎𝑟𝑠. 𝐻𝑒 𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑛 𝑎𝑟𝑡𝑖𝑠𝑡 𝑜𝑓 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑁𝐹𝑇 𝐹𝑎𝑐𝑡𝑜𝑟𝑦 𝑃𝑎𝑟𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑆𝑡𝑒́𝑝ℎ𝑎𝑛𝑒 𝑀𝑜𝑟𝑡𝑖𝑒𝑟 𝐺𝑎𝑙𝑙𝑒𝑟𝑦. 
He exhibits his works in the street, but also in museums (Bernardins Museum, City of Science and Industry, Luxembourg Museum in Paris)  
Direct contact : https://emochain.me/whatsapp
